text: Wo ruci paiqian ni [mu sheng] qu jiaohua yige minzu, zai ci zhiqian you xuduo minzu que yi shiqu, yibian ni xiang tamen xuandu wo suo qishi ni de jingdian [“gulanjing”], jinguan tamen reng bu xinyang pu ci zhi zhu [an la]. Ni shuo:“Ta [an la] shi wo de zhu, chu ta wai, zai meiyou ying shou chongbai de zhu. Wo zhi xinlai ta, wo zhi gui xin ta.”
